title: Herbal Eye Drops (Triphala-Based)
excerpt: Traditional triphala-based eye rinse designed to soothe eye strain and support ocular clarity.
content:
## What Are Triphala Eye Drops?
A gentle ocular rinse prepared from a sterilized triphala decoction processed specifically for eye safety. Designed to ease modern screen-related strain and support overall eye comfort.

## Ayurvedic Significance
Triphala is a classic Rasayana for the eyesâ€”cooling, rejuvenating, and cleansing.

### Key Benefits
- Helps reduce eye strain.
- Supports long-term ocular wellness.
- Refreshes dry, tired eyes.

## Ingredients
- Sterile triphala decoction
- Purified water
- Stabilizing solution as per ocular safety norms

## Usage Instructions
- Use strictly under professional guidance.
- Can be used as an eyewash or drops as advised.

## Packaging
- Sterile amber dropper bottle.

## Safety & Consultation
- Must be used with medical or Ayurvedic practitioner approval.
- Avoid if you have active infections or recent eye surgery.

## Why Choose This Preparation?
Professionally sterilized and prepared for ocular application using a time-tested Ayurvedic formula.
